医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
青少年主导的研究揭示了普遍存在的电子烟文化并寻求干预途径在加拿大的一项研究中，青少年研究人员让他们的同龄人参与焦点小组，探索青少年电子烟的现实，揭示使用和获取方面令人不安的趋势，同时也确定有效的反电子烟干预措施的潜在策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Teen-led-study-sheds-light-on-the-pervasive-vaping-culture-and-seeks-paths-for-intervention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Teen-led-study-sheds-light-on-the-pervasive-vaping-culture-and-seeks-paths-for-intervention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5d75888-c36c-41e0-9fba-c8e87df97f96 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 23:07:00 -0500 Teen-led study sheds light on the pervasive vaping culture and seeks paths for intervention
免疫印记：COVID-19 增强剂针对新变种的有效性减弱的症结所在《自然微生物学》中的这项研究回顾了免疫印记的概念及其对 SARS-CoV-2 抗体反应的影响，强调了针对新出现的变种的 COVID-19 加强疫苗接种功效面临的挑战。研究人员认为，了解免疫印记对于开发能够引发广泛而持久的免疫保护的疫苗至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Immune-imprinting-The-crux-of-waning-COVID-19-booster-effectness-against-new-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Immune-imprinting-The-crux-of-waning-COVID-19-booster-effectness-against-new-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de1edf01-03af-4554-a454-a2be37a67a09 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 22:47:00 -0500 Immune imprinting: The crux of waning COVID-19 booster effectiveness against new variants
CAR-T 细胞疗法可以持续抑制难治性狼疮患者的自身抗体美国风湿病学会年会 ACR Convergence 2023 上的新研究表明，CAR-T 细胞疗法可以持续抑制难治性狼疮中的自身抗体，同时保持对疫苗的强劲反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/CAR-T-cell-therapy-could-lead-to-sutain-suppression-of-autoantibodies-in-treatment-pressive-lupus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/CAR-T-cell-therapy-could-lead-to-sutain-suppression-of-autoantibodies-in-treatment-pressive-lupus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a87edb4d-f795-4c87-926d-64eef5638697 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 22:41:24 -0500 CAR-T cell therapy could lead to sustained suppression of autoantibodies in treatment-resistant lupus
研究发现，大流行隔离与英国老年人认知能力下降有关《柳叶刀》针对英国老年人的研究发现，COVID-19 大流行的社会限制导致工作记忆和执行功能等认知功能显着下降，尽管限制有所放松，但这种影响持续到第二年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Pandemic-isolation-linked-to-cognitive-decline-in-UKs-older-population-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Pandemic-isolation-linked-to-cognitive-decline-in-UKs-older-population-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=578a139d-90f7-45d3-938e-0e6e069e88e5 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 22:25:00 -0500 Pandemic isolation linked to cognitive decline in UK's older population, study finds
新的培训计划扩大了美洲原住民社区获得风湿病护理的机会美国风湿病学会 (ACR) 年会 ACR Convergence 2023 上的新研究描述了一项新计划的扩展，该计划旨在培训初级保健医生 (PCP) 在美洲原住民社区诊断和治疗类风湿性关节炎 (RA)。很少或无法获得风湿病护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/New-training-program-expands-access-to-rheumatology-care-for-Native-American-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/New-training-program-expands-access-to-rheumatology-care-for-Native-American-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ec24fb6-4de4-4a2f-a187-50d36d144271 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 22:23:04 -0500 New training program expands access to rheumatology care for Native American communities
专家制定公平的质量措施，到 2030 年改善狼疮护理到本十年末制定和实施狼疮护理公平新质量措施的项目的领导者将在美国风湿病学会年会 ACR Convergence 2023 上展示他们的工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Experts-develop-equitable-quality-measures-to-improve-lupus-care-by-2030.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Experts-develop-equitable-quality-measures-to-improve-lupus-care-by-2030.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d887e17-c85e-4405-ac09-b2923b9270b8 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 22:19:24 -0500 Experts develop equitable quality measures to improve lupus care by 2030
深度学习系统准确识别手部X光片中的关节间隙狭窄和侵蚀美国风湿病学会 (ACR) 年会 ACR Convergence 2023 上的新研究表明，深度学习系统可以准确识别和预测类风湿性关节炎 (RA) 患者手部 X 光片中的关节间隙狭窄和糜烂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Deep-learning-system-accurately-identizes-joint-space-narrowing-and-erosions-in-hand-radiographs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Deep-learning-system-accurately-identizes-joint-space-narrowing-and-erosions-in-hand-radiographs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37f29757-483c-4f47-8b17-5676c2833851 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 21:53:43 -0500 Deep learning system accurately identifies joint space narrowing and erosions in hand radiographs
抗磷脂抗体阳性与狼疮患者心血管风险增加有关美国风湿病学会 (ACR) 年会 ACR Convergence 2023 上的新研究描述了系统性红斑狼疮 (SLE) 患者抗磷脂抗体阳性与未来心血管疾病风险增加之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Positive-antiplasmid-antibodies-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-risk-in-lupus-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Positive-antiplasmid-antibodies-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-risk-in-lupus-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=642cea1c-f531-476c-bf14-51c7a0db7fd5 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 21:49:42 -0500 Positive antiphospholipid antibodies linked to increased cardiovascular risk in lupus patients
研究显示，随着时间的推移，原发性干燥症的唾液腺异常变得更加严重美国风湿病学会 (ACR) 年会 ACR Convergence 2023 上的新研究表明，超声检测到的原发性干燥病唾液腺异常会随着时间的推移变得更加严重，而且这种进展缓慢的疾病很可能早在首次出现之前就已经开始了检测到。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Salivary-gland-abnormalities-in-primary-Sjogrens-become-more-severe-over-time-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Salivary-gland-abnormalities-in-primary-Sjogrens-become-more-severe-over-time-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=730906e0-0b88-4cbb-9e04-4363db9d9c5c Tue, 07 Nov 2023 21:44:25 -0500 Salivary gland abnormalities in primary Sjögren's become more severe over time, study shows
JAK 抑制剂和托珠单抗对 VEXAS 综合征有更好的缓解率美国风湿病学会 (ACR) 年会 ACR Convergence 2023 上的新研究发现，与其他靶向疗法相比，JAK 抑制剂 (JAKi) 和托珠单抗对 VEXAS 综合征的缓解率更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/JAK-inhibitors-and-tocilizumab-elicit-better-response-rates-in-VEXAS-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/JAK-inhibitors-and-tocilizumab-elicit-better-response-rates-in-VEXAS-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1d46f5d-9ae3-41ea-b8aa-df30a32bd6c9 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 21:41:58 -0500 JAK inhibitors and tocilizumab elicit better response rates in VEXAS syndrome
